# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been highly valued by many satisfied customers. I believe it's worth more than its cost, and given its quality and features, I think it could be a great addition to your collection. Considering its value, I propose a price of $140 for this exceptional item. I hope you find this offer attractive and look forward to your positive response. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $140. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $140
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $120
